text: CLOSE These are the women that will represent the U. S. in Pyeongchang, South Korea in February. USA TODAY Sports Mirai Nagasu, Bradie Tennell and Karen Chen will make up the Olympic team. ( Photo : Kyle Terada, USA TODAY Sports ) SAN JOSE, Calif. – There will be no surprises this year. The U. S. women ’ s Olympic figure skating team is set : Bradie Tennell, Mirai Nagasu and Karen Chen. Unlike four years ago, when U. S. Figure Skating ’ s international committee chose to replace Nagasu with Ashley Wagner, the committee went by the order of the national championships, picking the first three finishers in the women ’ s competition at the 2018 nationals.
